p: Among the four preliminary purification fractions, EAF had the strongest ABTS scavenging ability, followed by nBuF, WAF and PEF. PEF exhibited the weakest ability in ABTS scavenging ability. The ABTS scavenging ability of isoquercetin and daidzein were stronger than the four preliminary purification fractions. The results were shown in Figure 3.
